sections.title: Introduction
sections.content: Dome is a chilling horror experience where every shadow hides a secret. Built for the RGB LED matrix, it brings a unique low-res aesthetic to life.

sections.title: Features
sections.content:
- Real-time stats and notifications
- Pixel art and video game rendering
- Unique low-resolution style

sections.title: Hardware Used
sections.content:
- Raspberry Pi 4 Model B
- 64x64 RGB LED Matrix Panel
- Electrodragon Active-3 Breakout Board

sections.title: How it Works
Conclusion
sections.content: Dome demonstrates how you can bring web technologies and hardware together for creative, real-time LED displays.
